snippet.title: Who is Abby - Walking Simulator Game - Official Early Access Release Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Step into Tom's shoes in "Who is Abby," an enthralling walking simulator meticulously crafted and detailed using the power of Unreal Engine 5.

In Who is Abby, players step into a narrative-driven experience that melds the immersive exploration of walking simulators with the intricate interactivity of point-and-click adventures. Delve into Tom's relentless search for answers in a world shrouded in mystery and ambiguity. As each chapter unfolds, secrets emerge from the shadows, pulling you deeper into Tom's quest to understand the enigma surrounding Abby. Can you unravel the mystery?

Gear up for the journey and mark the 20th of October, 2023, on your calendar, as "Who is Abby" drops on Steam Early Access.

🔗 Stay connected & get updates:

Steam Page : https://store.steampowered.com/app/2614800/Who_is_Abby/
Official Website : https://www.whoisabbygame.com
Discord : https://discord.gg/hVPCWY2d

#WhoIsAbby #UnrealEngine5 #SteamEarlyAccess #GamingTrailer
